452.Name: DefaultReportPoint
452.Explanation: Where to report to 0=Not set, set to venue number to include in contracts

454.Name: PublicLiability
454.Explanation: If set requires Insurance upload by performers

456.Name: CSSColourDark
456.Explanation: Main Dark Contrast eg for links

463.Name: CSSColourTue, Wed, Thur, Fri, Sat, Sun, Mon
463.Explanation: Colours used for each day of programme

464.Name: CSSColourDayTabBack
464.Explanation: Used as the background for Day tables (above)

468.Name: FooterBack
468.Explanation: Background to the footer, can be colour or an image

469.Name: Procession
469.Explanation: If you want to call it a Parade, set to Parade

470.Name: MultiLimFri (Sat, Sun ...
470.Explanation: Limit dance sides to that number on that day (work in progress)

471.Name: ProcessDays
471.Explanation: Bit map of days with processions bit 1=Fri, 2=Sat, 4=Sun, 8 = Mon

472.Name: DanceNeedAddress
472.Explanation: Is the Address a Needed field

473.Name: DanceOrg
473.Explanation: Dance Organiser(s) to sign off dance emails

474.Name: DanceDefaultSlot
474.Explanation: Sub Event default size for dance

480.Name: DanceNeedPerformers
480.Explanation: If set Number of performers is checked

481.Name: DanceNeedMobile
481.Explanation: If set need a Mobile number

482.Name: DanceNeedDays
482.Explanation: If set need to select at least one day

483.Name: DanceSpecialMessage
483.Explanation: Enables a special message for Dance sides. Value: Messages Name

484.Name: DanceDefaultPerSlot
484.Explanation: Sides per sub event slot default

485.Name: AllDanceTimes
485.Explanation: If set always shows the times for each dance slot.  Not normally needed

486.Name: RestrictOneProcession
486.Explanation: If set, dance sides can only indicate one of the processions

487.Name: DanceEmailsFrom
487.Explanation: Email address Dance emails will have

488.Name: DanceFullFri, Sat, Sun, Mon
488.Explanation: If Set that day is full (Short term hack until day limits coded properly)

489.Name: SMTPuser
489.Explanation: Username for sending emails (internal never externally seen)

491.Name: SMPTserver
491.Explanation: Server to send email from (if sending via another server)

492.Name: SMTPsubdomain
492.Explanation: To add a subdomain to the mail address

495.Name: ShowYear
495.Explanation: Festival to show on public pages

496.Name: PlanYear
496.Explanation: Festival to show on staff pages

497.Name: ShortName
497.Explanation: Short acronym for festival – must be set

498.Name: FestLegalName
498.Explanation: Legal name of the festival eg Chippenham Folk Festival C.I.C.

499.Name: FestLegalAddr[]
499.Explanation: The formal address of the festival, have as entries for each line of the address as needed

502.Name: FestName
502.Explanation: Name of Festival e.g. Chippenham Folk Festival

503.Name: HostURL
503.Explanation: URL for the festival eg chippfolk.co.uk

504.Name: FestHomeName
504.Explanation: Name of the festival’s location – eg Chippenham

505.Name: EnableDateChange
505.Explanation: If you have to change date of festival, this enables the messages

506.Name: EnableCancelMsg
506.Explanation: Message to be used on a date change

508.Name: RealFaviconGeneratorKey
508.Explanation: API Key used with Real Favicon Generator

509.Name: LookBackYears

510.Name: Camping
510.Explanation: See YearData.php to work out what it does

511.Name: FestVatNumber
511.Explanation: Vat number, if set the festival charges VAT

512.Name: VatRate
512.Explanation: VAT %age to use (if festival has a VAT Number

516.Name: InvoiceLogo
516.Explanation: Logo to be used on invoices

517.Name: FestTresEmail
517.Explanation: Email address Finance emails come from

519.Name: PerformerBanners
519.Explanation: If set, system will attempt making a banner for each side at the top of their performer public page.

520.Name: TopText4Perfs
520.Explanation: If set, the short performers description is added to a @Perf xxx tile on the front page

521.Name: DefaultPageBanner
521.Explanation: Default Banner for top of pages

522.Name: TopBannerScrollRate
522.Explanation: Scroll rate of top banner on top page (in milliseconds)

523.Name: BannerOverlay
523.Explanation: If set allows text over the banner on top page

525.Name: FoodCenter

526.Name: LinupShortDesc_Dance, _Music, _Comedy, _Family, _Youth, _Ceilidh, _Other

529.Name: NotAllPublic

530.Name: MainMenuTable
530.Explanation: Enables menu from database (should be always 1 now)

531.Name: Facebook

532.Name: Twitter
532.Explanation: Address to append to http://X.com/ in icon bar

533.Name: Instagram

534.Name: YouTube
534.Explanation: Address to append to http://YouTube.com/ in icon bar

538.Name: DefaultDirLat

539.Name: DefaultDirLong
539.Explanation: Default Long to give directions from

542.Name: GoogleAPI
542.Explanation: API used when getting directions from Google

543.Name: DirectionDefault
543.Explanation: Name of location where default directions are from

545.Explanation: Enables a special message for non Dance sides. Value: Messages Name

546.Name: MusicTypes

549.Explanation: Performers per sub event slot default (not currently used)

553.Name: PerformerTickets

555.Name: RecordEventChanges

556.Name: RecordPerfChanges
556.Explanation: Record Performer changes to report programme differences

557.Name: FreeText

559.Explanation: Who to send emails about the mailing list to

560.Name: MailListID

561.Explanation: Default pairs of performers per page

562.Explanation: If set Performers without descriptions will be omitted

564.Name: PaperEventFont

565.Name: WebSiteBanner

567.Name: TradeEmail

568.Name: TradeLastWeek

569.Name: TradeUnQuote
569.Explanation: Days after sending last week, before showing “UnQuote Message”

572.Name: InviteBetter

576.Name: TradeChamberCommerce
576.Explanation: Show Chamber of Commerce Tick Box

579.Name: TradeExtras
579.Explanation: Are their Trade Extras (power, tables etc)

582.Name: TradeCarpark
582.Explanation: Ask number of Car park passes needed
